title: Fever Claim
description: Rosemary never expected to be mated to the popular, sexy, and total hunk Gamma of her pack. She wants nothing to do with him but avoiding him isn't so easy. They are polar opposites and to be his in every way has got to be nothing more than a dream...or so she wants it to be.When a twist of fate has the two dumbstruck for the first time, will they be able to accept their destiny and fall for one another?
author: RamenLady
